about_the_game:
GOLD'S DUNGEON is a retro-inspired text based RPG with heavy Rouge-Like elements. Choose from 6 unique classes and customize them to your hearts content. Are you brave enough to ENTER THE DUNGEON?

Fight through a randomly generated dungeon!

in GOLD'S DUNGEON, every run is unique with new and exciting abilities, items and synergies for you to come across! Battle it out through an ever-evolving dungeon with enemies scaling to your level, always upping the ante but never acting as insurmountable obstacles provided you can think strategically.

Battle it out in fast-paced RPG combat!

Fight your foes like a true warrior with GOLD'S DUNGEON's innovative ability system where you hand-craft an arsenal of unique powers to devastate your foes. It's not all easy though, as your enemies have access to the same systems and powers that you have so stay sharp.

Craft your own character every run!

GOLD'S DUNGEON's 8 main classes establish a solid foundation to be built upon during the duration of your run. Upon every level up choose from one of three random abilities and progressively build a massive toolkit to eviscerate any opposition. Thats not the only part of your arsenal though, as GOLD'S DUNGEON includes an array of unique weaponry all with their own pros and cons. With all of the character build features included in GOLD'S DUNGEON, any player can and will find their own unique playstyle.
